alternativeNames: Maratti, Joannis Francisci; Maratti, Gio. Francesco; Maratti, Joannes Franciscus
examples: Romulea Maratti in Pl. Romul. Saturn. 13. 1772, nom. cons.
notes: Flora romana... Romae (1822): posthumous publication. Several sources (e.g. TL-2) list 1723 as the birth year.
source: CMI, Berkeley Algal List; Birth year in: Hunt Institute for Botanical Documentation, https://huntbot.org/floras/search?page=234 (via Lotte Burkhardt; B)
